Subskills.name: Battle Charged
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by battle charge.

Subskills.name: Arena Glider
Subskills.description: Increases the range of battle charge.

Subskills.name: Bulldozer
Subskills.description: Pull monsters infront of you on hit while charging impaling them when hitting terrain.

Subskills.name: Concrete Wall
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by battle charge according to your armor.

Subskills.name: Rampaging Assault
Subskills.description: Chance to knock monsters up dealing increased damage on hit.

Subskills.name: Turtle Armor
Subskills.description: Increases damage reduction for a short duration when using battle charge.

Subskills.name: Rocket Boots
Subskills.description: Increases the speed of battle charge.

Subskills.name: Shoulder Slam
Subskills.description: Chance to stun targets on hit.

Subskills.name: Call of the Fallen Heroes
Subskills.description: Call upon fallen heroes to charge by your side, dealing increased damage on a larger radius.

Subskills.name: Spear Dasher
Subskills.description: Throw lances around you as you charge.

Subskills.name: Bluntforce Trauma
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Provoking Arrival
Subskills.description: Taunt nearby monsters at the end of your charge.

Subskills.name: Hyper Assault
Subskills.description: Charge multiple times in high speed at the target area, dealing area of effect damage damage before falling from the sky smashing the ground, knocking monsters up with increased damage.

Subskills.name: Ground Slammer
Subskills.description: As you charge through monsters, leave the ground quaking for a small duration inflicting elemental break.
